column1: I'm Ken bone. Roast me. You know you want to.
I can't even manage to get a one night stand. Tell me why.
I lost my virginity to a baseball bat. Roast me like a goddamn prime rib!

My 'half black' friend thinks he's unroastable. Prove him wrong!


[deleted]

18f Basic Hipster Bitch. Roast me daddy!


[deleted]
A physicist and a french girl walk into a bar #roastus
21, lonely and living off of government handouts. Do your worst.
No stereotypical black jokes, hit me with something new
I spend nearly every minute of my free time on my computer. My video game tastes include LEGO video games and Minecraft. I have autism. Roast me!
I'm prime material for this. To be the worst, I've got to take the worst. Roast me!
im 18, i have daddy issues, im not wearing makeup, i dont take care of my eyebrows, and i just got out of the shower so my hair is messy...lets hear something original!
roast me and my dry skin, huge forehead and pubestache please.
I've already been told I look like a 'war criminal' by someone in my college, but let's see what Reddit's certified flamethrower operators come up with.

Privileged white girl, tear me apart.
